<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Total revenue less operating costs. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Includes a pre-tax employee retirement expense of $54.8 million and a pre-tax gain on sale of investment of $117.4 million. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Includes a pre-tax loss on repurchases and exchanges of debt of $0.9 million. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Includes a pre-tax loss on repurchases and exchanges of debt of $68.4 million. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Includes a pre-tax loss on repurchases and exchanges of debt of $0.7 million. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(f)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Includes a pre-tax loss on repurchases and exchanges of debt of $0.4 million. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>15.&nbsp;Recently Issued Accounting Standards </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Financial Accounting Standards Board (FASB) recently issued the following
standards which were reviewed by Chesapeake to determine the potential impact on our financial statements upon adoption.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In December 2004,
the FASB issued SFAS 123(R), <I>Share-Based Payment</I>, a revision of SFAS 123, <I>Accounting for Stock-Based Compensation</I>. This statement establishes standards for the accounting for transactions in which an entity exchanges its equity
instruments for goods or services by requiring a public entity to measure the cost of employee services received in exchange for an award of equity instruments based on the grant-date fair value of the award. We adopted this statement effective
January&nbsp;1, 2006. The effect of SFAS 123(R) is more fully described in Note 1. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In September 2005, the Emerging Issues Task Force
(EITF) reached a consensus on Issue No.&nbsp;04-13, <I>Accounting for Purchases and Sales of Inventory with the Same Counterparty</I>. EITF Issue No.&nbsp;04-13 requires that purchases and sales of inventory with the same counterparty in the same
line of business should be accounted for as a single non-monetary exchange, if entered into in contemplation of one another. The consensus is effective for inventory arrangements entered into, modified or renewed in interim or annual reporting
periods beginning after March&nbsp;15, 2006. We adopted this issue effective April&nbsp;1, 2006. The adoption of EITF Issue No.&nbsp;04-13 did not have a material impact on our financial statements. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">113 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

<h5 align="left"><a href="#INDEX">Index to Financial Statements</a></h5>


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION AND SUBSIDIARIES </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS&#151;(Continued) </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In June 2006, the FASB issued FASB Interpretation (FIN) No.&nbsp;48, <I>Accounting for Uncertainty in
Income Taxes&#151;an interpretation of FASB Statement No.&nbsp;109</I>.<I> FIN 48 provides guidance for recognizing and measuring uncertain tax positions, as defined in SFAS 109, </I><I>Accounting for Income Taxes</I>. FIN 48 prescribes a threshold
condition that a tax position must meet for any of the benefit of the uncertain tax position to be recognized in the financial statements. Guidance is also provided regarding de-recognition, classification and disclosure of these uncertain tax
positions. FIN 48 is effective for fiscal years beginning after December&nbsp;15, 2006. Based on our evaluation as of December&nbsp;31, 2006, we do not expect that FIN 48 will have a material impact on our financial position, results of operations
or cash flows. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In February 2006, the FASB issued SFAS No.&nbsp;155, <I>Accounting for Certain Hybrid Financial Instruments&#151;an
amendment of FASB Statements No.&nbsp;133 and 140</I>. SFAS 155 permits an entity to measure at fair value any financial instrument that contains an embedded derivative that otherwise would require bifurcation. This statement is effective for all
financial instruments acquired or issued after the beginning of an entity&#146;s first fiscal year that begins after September&nbsp;15, 2006. We are currently evaluating the provisions of SFAS 155 and believe that adoption will not have a material
effect on our financial position, results of operations or cash flows. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In September 2006, the FASB issued SFAS No.&nbsp;157, <I>Fair Value
Measurements</I>. This statement defines fair value, establishes a framework for measuring fair value in generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP), and expands disclosures about fair value measurements. This statement is effective for
financial statements issued for fiscal years beginning after November&nbsp;15, 2007. We are currently assessing the impact, if any, SFAS 157 and believe that adoption will not have a material effect on our financial position, results of operations
or cash flows. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In September 2006, the FASB issued SFAS No.&nbsp;158, <I>Employers&#146; Accounting for Defined Benefit Pension and Other
Postretirement Plans</I>. This statement requires an employer to recognize the overfunded or underfunded status of a defined benefit postretirement plan (other than a multiemployer plan) as an asset or liability in its statement of financial
position and to recognize changes in that funded status in the year in which the changes occur through comprehensive income. This statement is effective as of the end of the fiscal year ending after December&nbsp;15, 2006. SFAS 158 did not have a
material impact on our financial position, results of operations or cash flows. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">114 </FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">As of December&nbsp;31, 2004, we determined that it is more likely than not that the $6.8 million of the net deferred tax assets related to net operating losses generated by
Louisiana properties would be realized due to acquisitions which occurred in 2004. Therefore, the $6.8 million valuation allowance was reversed. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">115 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

<A NAME="tx87427_12"></A>ITEM&nbsp;9.</B><B><I></I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Changes in and Disagreements with Accountants on Accounting and Financial Disclosure</I></B><B> </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Not applicable. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>
<A NAME="tx87427_13"></A>ITEM&nbsp;9A.</B><B><I></I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Controls and Procedures </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">We maintain
disclosure controls and procedures designed to ensure that information required to be disclosed by Chesapeake in reports filed or submitted by it under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 is recorded, processed, summarized and reported within the
time periods specified in the Securities and Exchange Commission rules and forms. As of December&nbsp;31, 2006, we carried out an evaluation, under the supervision and with the participation of Chesapeake management, including Chesapeake&#146;s
Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer of the effectiveness of the design and operation of Chesapeake&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures pursuant to Securities Exchange Act Rule 13a-15(b). Based upon that evaluation, our Chief
Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer concluded that our disclosure controls and procedures are effective as of December&nbsp;31, 2006, to ensure that information required to be disclosed by Chesapeake is accumulated and communicated to
Chesapeake management, including Chesapeake&#146;s Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, as appropriate to allow timely decisions regarding required disclosure. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Changes in Internal Controls </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No changes in the company&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting occurred during the quarter ended December&nbsp;31, 2006 that have materially affected, or are reasonably likely to materially affect, the company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Management&#146;s Report on Internal Control Over Financial Reporting </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Management&#146;s report on internal control over financial reporting and the attestation report of our independent registered public accounting firm are included in Item&nbsp;8 of this report. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.1.1
<SEQUENCE>2
<FILENAME>dex411.htm
<DESCRIPTION>NINTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE TO INDENTURE DATED MAY 27, 2004
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Ninth Supplemental Indenture to Indenture dated May 27, 2004</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">


<HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:3px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 4.1.1 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">7.5% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2014 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NINTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 9, 2007 </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY,
N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE
COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS NINTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of February&nbsp;9, 2007 is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the &#147;<I>Company</I>&#148;), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the &#147;<I>Subsidiary Guarantors</I>&#148;) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of May&nbsp;27, 2004, as supplemented prior to the date hereof (the &#147;<I>Indenture</I>&#148;),
pursuant to which the Company has originally issued $300,000,000 in principal amount of 7.5% Senior Notes due 2014 (the &#147;<I>Notes</I>&#148;); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect the
release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated
Diamond Y Enterprises, Incorporated (&#147;Diamond Y&#148;), a Pennsylvania corporation and Gene D. Yost&nbsp;&amp; Son, Inc. (&#147;Gene D. Yost&#148;), an Oklahoma corporation as Restricted Subsidiaries of the Company and desires to add the
entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has taken all actions required to effect the release,
pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of W.W. Realty, L.L.C. (&#147;W.W. Realty&#148;), an Oklahoma Limited Liability Company; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company, of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this Ninth
Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and performed; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the
Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This Ninth Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall be deemed to form a
part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This
Ninth Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its execution and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this Ninth Supplemental Indenture, Diamond Y, a Pennsylvania corporation, and Gene D. Yost, an Oklahoma
corporation, are subject to the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I> As a result of the merger of W.W. Realty, with and into Chesapeake Land Company,
L.L.C. (&#147;Chesapeake Land&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, W.W. Realty shall for all purposes be released as a Subsidiary
Guarantor from it&#146;s Guarantee and related obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of W.W. Realty and the
signature of an Officer of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with W.W. Realty and a Subsidiary
Guarantor, Chesapeake Land hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis
mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to
be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this Ninth Supplemental Indenture. This Ninth Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as
if those terms and conditions were repeated at length herein and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee that Diamond Y and Gene D. Yost have been designated by the Board of Directors of the Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined in the Indenture).
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS NINTH SUPPLEMENTAL
INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this Ninth Supplemental Indenture. Each signed copy
shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Ninth Supplemental Indenture to be duly executed,
all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.2.1
<SEQUENCE>3
<FILENAME>dex421.htm
<DESCRIPTION>NINTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE TO INDENTURE DATED AS OF AUGUST 2, 2004
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Ninth Supplemental Indenture to Indenture dated as of August 2, 2004</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">


<HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:3px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 4.2.1 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">7.00% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2014 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NINTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 9, 2007 </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY,
N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE
COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS NINTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of February&nbsp;9, 2007, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A. as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of August&nbsp;2, 2004, as supplemented prior to the date hereof (the <I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>),
pursuant to which the Company has originally issued $300,000,000 in principal amount of 7.00% Senior Notes due 2014 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect the
release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated
Diamond Y Enterprises, Incorporated (&#147;Diamond Y&#148;), a Pennsylvania corporation and Gene D. Yost&nbsp;&amp; Son, Inc. (&#147;Gene D. Yost&#148;), an Oklahoma corporation as Restricted Subsidiaries of the Company and desires to add the
entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has taken all actions required to effect the release,
pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of W.W. Realty, L.L.C. (&#147;W.W. Realty&#148;), an Oklahoma Limited Liability Company; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company, of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this Ninth
Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and performed; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the
Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This Ninth Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall be deemed to form a
part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This Ninth Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its
execution and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this Ninth Supplemental Indenture,
Diamond Y, a Pennsylvania corporation, and Gene D. Yost, an Oklahoma corporation, are subject to the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I>
As a result of the merger of W.W. Realty, with and into Chesapeake Land Company, L.L.C. (&#147;Chesapeake Land&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the
Indenture, W.W. Realty shall for all purposes be released as a Subsidiary Guarantor from it&#146;s Guarantee and related obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the
Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of W.W. Realty and the signature of an Officer of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As
the surviving entity in its merger with W.W. Realty and a Subsidiary Guarantor, Chesapeake Land hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the
Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings
ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities
or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this Ninth Supplemental Indenture. This Ninth Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set
forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as if those terms and conditions were repeated at length herein and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee that Diamond Y and Gene D. Yost have been designated by the Board of Directors of the
Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined in the Indenture). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS NINTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this Ninth Supplemental Indenture.
Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[NEXT PAGE IS SIGNATURE
PAGE] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 4 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Ninth Supplemental Indenture to be duly executed,
all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">

<DESCRIPTION>THIRTEENTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE TO INDENTURE DATED AS OF DECEMBER 20, 2002
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Thirteenth Supplemental Indenture to Indenture dated as of December 20, 2002</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">


<HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:3px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 4.3.1 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">7.75% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2015 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIRTEENTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 9, 2007 </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY,
N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE
COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS THIRTEENTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of February&nbsp;9, 2007, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of December&nbsp;20, 2002, as supplemented prior to the date hereof (the
<I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>), pursuant to which the Company has originally issued $150,000,000 in principal amount of 7.75% Senior Notes due 2015 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture
without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect: (a)&nbsp;the addition of any Subsidiary Guarantor, as provided for in the Indenture, and (b)&nbsp;the release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated Diamond Y Enterprises, Incorporated (&#147;Diamond Y&#148;), a Pennsylvania corporation and
Gene D. Yost&nbsp;&amp; Son, Inc. (&#147;Gene D. Yost&#148;), an Oklahoma corporation as Restricted Subsidiaries of the Company and desires to add the entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has taken all actions required to effect the release, pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of W.W. Realty, L.L.C.
(&#147;W.W. Realty&#148;), an Oklahoma Limited Liability Company; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by
the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company, of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this Thirteenth Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the
Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and performed; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the
provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This Thirteenth Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall be deemed to form a part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for any and all
purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This Thirteenth Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon
its execution and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this Thirteenth Supplemental Indenture,
Diamond Y, a Pennsylvania corporation, and Gene D. Yost, an Oklahoma corporation, are subject to the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I>
As a result of the merger of W.W. Realty, with and into Chesapeake Land Company, L.L.C. (&#147;Chesapeake Land&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the
Indenture, W.W. Realty shall for all purposes be released as a Subsidiary Guarantor from it&#146;s Guarantee and related obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the
Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of W.W. Realty and the signature of an Officer of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As
the surviving entity in its merger with W.W. Realty and a Subsidiary Guarantor, Chesapeake Land hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the
Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings
ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities
or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this Thirteenth Supplemental Indenture. This Thirteenth Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and
conditions set forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as if those terms and conditions were repeated at length herein and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee that Diamond Y and Gene D. Yost have been designated by the Board of Directors of the
Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined in the Indenture). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS THIRTEENTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this Thirteenth Supplemental
Indenture. Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[NEXT PAGE
IS SIGNATURE PAGE] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 4 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Thirteenth Supplemental Indenture to be duly
executed, all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.6.1
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>dex461.htm
<DESCRIPTION>TWELFTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE TO INDENTURE DATED AS OF MARCH 5, 2003
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Twelfth Supplemental Indenture to Indenture dated as of March 5, 2003</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">


<HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:3px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 4.6.1 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">7.5% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2013 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">TWELFTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 9, 2007 </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY,
N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE
COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS TWELFTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of February&nbsp;9, 2007, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of March&nbsp;5, 2003, as supplemented prior to the date hereof (the <I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>),
pursuant to which the Company has originally issued $300,000,000 in principal amount of 7.5% Senior Notes due 2013 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect the
release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated
Diamond Y Enterprises, Incorporated (&#147;Diamond Y&#148;), a Pennsylvania corporation and Gene D. Yost&nbsp;&amp; Son, Inc. (&#147;Gene D. Yost&#148;), an Oklahoma corporation as Restricted Subsidiaries of the Company and desires to add the
entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has taken all actions required to effect the release,
pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of W.W. Realty, L.L.C. (&#147;W.W. Realty&#148;), an Oklahoma Limited Liability Company; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company, of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this Twelfth
Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and performed; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the
Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This Twelfth Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall be deemed to form a
part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This
Twelfth Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its execution and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this Twelfth Supplemental Indenture, Diamond Y, a Pennsylvania corporation, and Gene D. Yost, an
Oklahoma corporation, are subject to the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I> As a result of the merger of W.W. Realty, with and into Chesapeake Land Company,
L.L.C. (&#147;Chesapeake Land&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, W.W. Realty shall for all purposes be released as a Subsidiary
Guarantor from it&#146;s Guarantee and related obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of W.W. Realty and the
signature of an Officer of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with W.W. Realty and a Subsidiary
Guarantor, Chesapeake Land hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis
mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to
be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this Twelfth Supplemental Indenture. This Twelfth Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set forth in the Indenture with the same force and
effect as if those terms and conditions were repeated at length herein and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee that Diamond Y and Gene D. Yost have been designated by the Board of Directors of the Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined in the Indenture).
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS TWELFTH SUPPLEMENTAL
INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this Twelfth Supplemental Indenture. Each signed copy
shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.7.1
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>dex471.htm
<DESCRIPTION>TENTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE TO INDENTURE DATED AS OF NOVEMBER 26, 2003
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Tenth Supplemental Indenture to Indenture dated as of November 26, 2003</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">


<HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:3px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 4.7.1 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">6.875% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2016 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">TENTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 9, 2007 </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY,
N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE
COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS TENTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of February&nbsp;9, 2007, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption <I>&#147;</I>Subsidiary Guarantors<I>&#148;</I> on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and
The Bank of New York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of November&nbsp;26, 2003, as
supplemented prior to the date hereof (the <I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>), pursuant to which the Company has originally issued $200,000,000 in principal amount of 6.875% Senior Notes due 2016 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture
without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect the release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated Diamond Y Enterprises, Incorporated (&#147;Diamond Y&#148;), a Pennsylvania corporation and Gene D. Yost&nbsp;&amp; Son, Inc. (&#147;Gene D. Yost&#148;), an Oklahoma corporation
as Restricted Subsidiaries of the Company and desires to add the entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the
Company has taken all actions required to effect the release, pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of W.W. Realty, L.L.C. (&#147;W.W. Realty&#148;), an Oklahoma Limited Liability Company; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company,
of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this Tenth Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and
performed; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the
Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This Tenth Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall
be deemed to form a part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This Tenth Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its execution and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this Tenth Supplemental Indenture, Diamond Y, a Pennsylvania corporation, and Gene D. Yost, an Oklahoma
corporation, are subject to the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I> As a result of the merger of W.W. Realty, with and into Chesapeake Land Company,
L.L.C. (&#147;Chesapeake Land&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, W.W. Realty shall for all purposes be released as a Subsidiary
Guarantor from it&#146;s Guarantee and related obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of W.W. Realty and the
signature of an Officer of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with W.W. Realty and a Subsidiary
Guarantor, Chesapeake Land hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis
mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to
be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this Tenth Supplemental Indenture. This Tenth Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as
if those terms and conditions were repeated at length herein and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee that Diamond Y and Gene D. Yost have been designated by the Board of Directors of the Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined in the Indenture).
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS TENTH SUPPLEMENTAL
INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this Tenth Supplemental Indenture. Each signed copy
shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 4 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Tenth Supplemental Indenture to be duly executed,
all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">

SIZE="2"><B>Resources of the Company and of the</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Subsidiaries listed below:</B></FONT></P></TD></TR>

<TR>

SIZE="2">following limited partnerships:</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.8.1
<SEQUENCE>7
<FILENAME>dex481.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EIGTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE TO INDENTURE DATED AS OF DECEMBER 8, 2004
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Eigth Supplemental Indenture to Indenture dated as of December 8, 2004</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">


<HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:3px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 4.8.1 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">6.375% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2015 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">EIGHTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 9, 2007 </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY,
N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE
COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS EIGHTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of February&nbsp;9, 2007, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of December&nbsp;8, 2004, as supplemented prior to the date hereof (the
<I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>), pursuant to which the Company has originally issued $600,000,000 in principal amount of 6.375% Senior Notes due 2015 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture
without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect the release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated Diamond Y Enterprises, Incorporated (&#147;Diamond Y&#148;), a Pennsylvania corporation and Gene D. Yost&nbsp;&amp; Son, Inc. (&#147;Gene D. Yost&#148;), an Oklahoma corporation
as Restricted Subsidiaries of the Company and desires to add the entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the
Company has taken all actions required to effect the release, pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of W.W. Realty, L.L.C. (&#147;W.W. Realty&#148;), an Oklahoma Limited Liability Company; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company,
of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this Eighth Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and
performed; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the
Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This Eighth Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall
be deemed to form a part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This Eighth Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its
execution and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this Eighth Supplemental Indenture,
Diamond Y, a Pennsylvania corporation, and Gene D. Yost, an Oklahoma corporation, are subject to the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I>
As a result of the merger of W.W. Realty, with and into Chesapeake Land Company, L.L.C. (&#147;Chesapeake Land&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the
Indenture, W.W. Realty shall for all purposes be released as a Subsidiary Guarantor from it&#146;s Guarantee and related obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the
Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of W.W. Realty and the signature of an Officer of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As
the surviving entity in its merger with W.W. Realty and a Subsidiary Guarantor, Chesapeake Land hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of W.W. Realty. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the
Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings
ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities
or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this Eighth Supplemental Indenture. This Eighth Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set
forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as if those terms and conditions were repeated at length herein and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee that Diamond Y and Gene D. Yost have been designated by the Board of Directors of the
Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined in the Indenture). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS EIGHTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this Eighth Supplemental
Indenture. Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[NEXT PAGE
IS SIGNATURE PAGE] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 4 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Eighth Supplemental Indenture to be duly
executed, all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">
